cast: 约翰·巴里摩尔 John Barrymore
埃塞尔·巴里摩尔 Ethel Barrymore
莱昂纳尔·巴里摩尔 Lionel Barrymore
awards:
第6届奥斯卡金像奖(1934)
　　最佳原创故事(提名) 查尔斯·麦克阿瑟
writer: 查尔斯·麦克阿瑟 Charles MacArthur
director: 理查德·波列拉夫斯基 Richard Boleslawski
introduction: As Europe looms on the edge of war in 1913, the family and members of the court of the Russian czar Nicholas come under the sway of a mysterious mystic named Rasputin. When Rasputin miraculously appears to cure the czar's son Alyosha of his hemophilia, the monk's reputation is cemented, particularly in the mind of the princess Natasha. Natasha's fiancé (and, later, husband) Prince Paul Chegodieff, however, suspects Rasputin is a charlatan who will cause the downfall of the royal family and perhaps of Russia itself.
